name: JasonRosell
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Jason Rosell's "Mind Right Body Tight" weekly flash briefing. 

My mission and goal is to empower individuals to develop the skills they need to improve themselves in all areas and thrive in life. 

Although a lot of people know me as the television celebrity lifestyle, wellness coach and social media strategist to brands, before I became who I am today, I was broke, overweight and depressed for 20 years. I was not happy, unsuccessful, insecure and did not have a purpose in life. That all changed dramatically and since then, I have also been able to help transform the lives of 1000's of women and men around the globe with my life coaching, food + fitness programs as well and helping others in their social media through my coaching.

This series is made for women and men who want to improve their lives in many categories with tips and tools on how to execute them and live the life of your dreams. 

I'll will be covering tactics and tips for optimizing your mindset, weight loss, improving communication in your relationships, social media business growing tips, skin care, body care, and meditation tips along with powerful and love quotes in addition to the following topics: Fat loss, workout routines, fun recipes, living life to the fullest, latest trends and much more!

I am doing this free briefing weekly to empower you, and let you know that anything is possible in life with the right attitude and mindset.

Subscribe and enable this my skill to unlock your most amazing life! Reach your highest potential to learn, grow, and become the most incredible person from the inside out like the bad ass you are!

You can learn more about me and get my free fat loss and motivation ebook by visiting my official website http://JasonRosell.com 

While you are there, check out my latest programs, TV shows, weekly blogs and subscribe to get your free copy of my book and monthly newsletter with loads of free goodies you will love!

If you love vides, you can also subscribe to my http://Youtube.com/JasonRosell channel.

Jason Rosell

#MindRightBodyTight 

ps: On instagram? Follow me on http://Instagram.com/jasonrosellLIVE
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
